LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} hasta oldu ({1}). {0} ile ilgilendiğinden emin ol. mümkün oldukça yatakta dinlendir. Hastalığı yenmesi için tedavi et.

LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: As {0} draws near the ancient wall, a sense of foreboding overcomes HIM. HECAP isn't sure why, but HE feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.
LanguageData.AnimalBerserkFromDamage: A {0} has gone berserk after being harmed!
